details.name: Function
details.value:
1. GD6001Control system, Adjustable temperature, FM radio, CD connection, Telephone receiver, Steam bath, Ozone, Top light, Wall lamp.
2. Foot massage, Cold and Hot water inlet, Cold and Hot, Top shower, Acupuncture nozzles, Movable shower, Exhaust fan.
3. Voltage :210~240V, Total power: 3 KW
